page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: My name is MEGAN CRASKE and I wake up at 7.30 in the morning. I get down from my bed with a ladder because my bed is high up on the wall. I go into the bathroom and then get dressed out of my nightshirt into my school clothes. I go down stairs to breakfast of a coffee and some cereals. Next I brush my teeth . I pack my lunch of sandwiches,drink, fruit, a piece of cake and a chocolate biscuit. I go to school on my bicycle which is red and silver with a basket. I go to my classroom and Mrs Haresign, our headteacher, calls our names out for the register and then we start work.At 10.30hrs we have a quarter of an hour play time.We usually read, either aloud or quietly to ourselves and exercises in Maths and English.At 12.00hrs we have our packed lunch and then go out to play until 13.15hrs.
